channel.title: Key Vault on Marczak.IO
channel.description: Adam Marczak blog created for purpose of personal contribution and sharing knowledge to communities everywhere.

item.title: Automating Enterprise Azure (EA) consumption reporting at 0.02$ per month using Functions (open-source)
item.description: Couple day private project that I deployed at my company but wanted to share with everyone. It has it all, one click dpeloyment, open source code, power bi template, low cost with azure serverless and more!
